page.description: Returns the uppercase trimmed version of the string supplied.

description.p: Return the input string formatted in upper case with leading and trailing whitespace removed.

page.discussion: Converts all the text to uppercase, and removes leading and trailing blanks from a character string.
page.example:
? ut(" assorted parts ") = "ASSORTED PARTS"
DIM lastname as C = "Dudley " DIM firstname as C = "Beth " ? ut(lastname) + upper(firstname) = "DUDLEYBETH "
